IX.iii.1.H.3.a
.
General Information on COLA Adjustments
Cost-of-living adjustments (COLAs) in sources of income, such as Social Security income, may affect the rate of current-law pension and Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC).  VA systems calculate post-COLA Social Security rates for each beneficiary.  The VA calculated Social Security rate is used to determine the VA beneficiary’s IVAP.
